verses.verse: Brethren <WG80>, my <WG1699> heart's <WG2588> desire <WG2107> and <WG2532> prayer <WG1162> to <WG4314> 'Elohim <WG2316> for <WG5228> Yisra'EL <WG2474> is <WG2076> <WG5748>, that <WG3303> <WG1519> they might be saved <WG4991>.

For <WG1063> I bear <WG3140> them <WG846> record <WG3140> <WG5719> that <WG3754> they have <WG2192> <WG5719> a zeal <WG2205> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, but <WG235> not <WG3756> according <WG2596> to knowledge <WG1922>.

For <WG1063> they being ignorant <WG50> <WG5723> of 'Elohim's <WG2316> righteousness <WG1343>, and <WG2532> going about <WG2212> <WG5723> to establish <WG2476> <WG5658> their own <WG2398> righteousness <WG1343>, have <WG5293> not <WG3756> submitted themselves <WG5293> <WG5648> unto the righteousness <WG1343> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.
For <WG1063> Moshiach <WG5547> is the goal <WG5056> of the Torah <WG3551> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343> to every one <WG3956> that believeth <WG4100> <WG5723>.

For <WG1063> Mosheh <WG3475> describeth <WG1125> <WG5719> the righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3588> is of <WG1537> the Torah <WG3551>, That <WG3754> the man <WG444> which doeth <WG4160> <WG5660> those things <WG846> shall live <WG2198> <WG5695> by <WG1722> them <WG846>.

But <WG1161> the righteousness <WG1343> which is of <WG1537> faith <WG4102> speaketh <WG3004> <WG5719> on this wise <WG3779>, Say <WG2036> <WG5632> not <WG3361> in <WG1722> thine <WG4675> heart <WG2588>, Who <WG5101> shall ascend <WG305> <WG5695> into <WG1519> heaven <WG3772>? (that is <WG5123> <WG5748>, to bring <WG2609> Moshiach <WG5547> down <WG2609> <WG5629> from above:)

Or <WG2228>, Who <WG5101> shall descend <WG2597> <WG5695> into <WG1519> the deep <WG12>? (that is <WG5123> <WG5748>, to bring up <WG321> Moshiach <WG5547> again <WG321> <WG5629> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>.)

But <WG235> what <WG5101> saith it <WG3004> <WG5719>? The word <WG4487> is <WG2076> <WG5748> nigh <WG1451> thee <WG4675>, even in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> mouth <WG4750>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> thy <WG4675> heart <WG2588>: that is <WG5123> <WG5748>, the word <WG4487> of faith <WG4102>, which <WG3739> we preach <WG2784> <WG5719>;

That <WG3754> if <WG1437> thou shalt confess <WG3670> <WG5661> with <WG1722> thy <WG4675> mouth <WG4750> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424>, and <WG2532> shalt believe <WG4100> <WG5661> in <WG1722> thine <WG4675> heart <WG2588> that <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath raised <WG1453> <WG5656> him <WG846> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, thou shalt be saved <WG4982> <WG5701>.

For <WG1063> with the heart <WG2588> man believeth <WG4100> <WG5743> unto <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>; and <WG1161> with the mouth <WG4750> confession is made <WG3670> <WG5743> unto <WG1519> salvation <WG4991>.
For <WG1063> the scripture <WG1124> saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, Whosoever <WG3956> believeth <WG4100> <WG5723> on <WG1909> him <WG846> shall <WG2617> not <WG3756> be ashamed <WG2617> <WG5701>.

For <WG1063> there is <WG2076> <WG5748> no <WG3756> difference <WG1293> between <WG5037> the Jew <WG2453> and <WG2532> the Greek <WG1672>: for <WG1063> the same <WG846> YY <WG2962> over all <WG3956> is rich <WG4147> <WG5723> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> that call upon <WG1941> <WG5734> him <WG846>.
For <WG3956> <WG1063> whosoever <WG3739> <WG302> shall call upon <WG1941> <WG5672> the name <WG3686> of the YY <WG2962> shall be saved <WG4982> <WG5701>.

How <WG4459> then <WG3767> shall they call on <WG1941> <WG5698> him in <WG1519> whom <WG3739> they have <WG4100> not <WG3756> believed <WG4100> <WG5656>? and <WG1161> how <WG4459> shall they believe in <WG4100> <WG5692> him of whom <WG3739> they have <WG191> not <WG3756> heard <WG191> <WG5656>? and <WG1161> how <WG4459> shall they hear <WG191> <WG5692> without <WG5565> a preacher <WG2784> <WG5723>?

And <WG1161> how <WG4459> shall they preach <WG2784> <WG5692>, except <WG3362> they be sent <WG649> <WG5652>? as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, How <WG5613> beautiful <WG5611> are the feet of them <WG4228> that preach the gospel <WG2097> <WG5734> of peace <WG1515>, and bring glad tidings <WG2097> <WG5734> of good things <WG18>!

But <WG235> they have <WG5219> not <WG3756> all <WG3956> obeyed <WG5219> <WG5656> the gospel <WG2098>. For <WG1063> Esaias <WG2268> saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, YY <WG2962>, who <WG5101> hath believed <WG4100> <WG5656> our <WG2257> report <WG189>?
So then <WG686> faith <WG4102> cometh by <WG1537> hearing <WG189>, and <WG1161> hearing <WG189> by <WG1223> the word <WG4487> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.

But <WG235> I say <WG3004> <WG5719>, Have <WG191> they not <WG3378> heard <WG191> <WG5656>? Yes verily <WG3304>, their <WG846> sound <WG5353> went <WG1831> <WG5627> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> their <WG846> words <WG4487> unto <WG1519> the ends <WG4009> of the world <WG3625>.

But <WG235> I say <WG3004> <WG5719>, Did <WG1097> not <WG3378> Yisra'EL <WG2474> know <WG1097> <WG5627>? First <WG4413> Mosheh <WG3475> saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, I <WG1473> will provoke <WG3863> you <WG5209> to jealousy <WG3863> <WG5692> by <WG1909> them that are no <WG3756> people <WG1484>, and by <WG1909> a foolish <WG801> nation <WG1484> I will anger <WG3949> <WG5692> you <WG5209>.

But <WG1161> Esaias <WG2268> is very bold <WG662> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, I was found <WG2147> <WG5681> of them that sought <WG2212> <WG5723> me <WG1691> not <WG3361>; I was made <WG1096> <WG5633> manifest <WG1717> unto them that asked <WG1905> not <WG3361> after <WG1905> <WG5723> me <WG1691>.

But <WG1161> to <WG4314> Yisra'EL <WG2474> he saith <WG3004> <WG5719>, All <WG3650> day long <WG2250> I have stretched forth <WG1600> <WG5656> my <WG3450> hands <WG5495> unto <WG4314> a dis`Ovedient <WG544> <WG5723> and <WG2532> gainsaying <WG483> <WG5723> people <WG2992>.
